          <title>
            <string language="en">A helium balloon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Heliumballon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un ballon d'hélium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um balão do helium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un aerostato dell'elio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μπαλόνι ηλίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un globo del helio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First in a series of four illustrations showing different uses of gases. Shown here is a balloon filled with helium gas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">balloons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">helium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst in einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, die 
unterschiedliche Gebräuche von Gasen zeigen. Hier gezeigt ein 
Ballon, der mit Heliumgas gefüllt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord dans une série de quatre illustrations 
montrant différentes utilisations des gaz. Montré ici est un 
ballon rempli de gaz d'hélium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente em uma série de quatro 
ilustrações que mostram usos diferentes dos gáses. É 
mostrado aqui um balão enchido com o gás do helium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Primo di una serie di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano gli usi differenti dei gas. È indicato qui un 
aerostato riempito di gas dell'elio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν διαφορετικές χρήσεις των αερίων. Εμφανισμένο 
εδώ είναι ένα μπαλόνι που γεμίζουν με το ήλιο αέριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero en una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran diversas aplicaciones de gases. Se muestra aquí un 
globo llenado del gas del helio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ballone</string>
          </keyword>
